title: Approach a Potential Career Change As If You Were Designing a New Product
description:
Feeling unhappy and unfulfilled at work is one thing: Knowing what to do instead is something else completely. At this point, most people probably realize that there’s no such thing as a “dream job,” but that doesn’t necessarily mean that the only other option is sticking with a job you hate. The hard part (well, one…

title: Use This Renovation Calculator to Figure Out Which Home Upgrades Add the Most Value

title: You Should Clean Your Sink's Overflow Hole
description:
As its name suggests, a sink’s overflow hole gives water a place to go in the event that the drain is closed or blocked, and the faucet is left on. While the sink’s drain is located at the bottom of the basin, the overflow hole can be found along one of the sides, towards the top.

Read more...
